summary: This module provides a suite of pytest-based unit tests that validate the behavior of the SageMaker integration within the litellm library, covering synchronous and asynchronous completions, streaming responses, messageâ€‘based APIs, prompt templates, custom AWS parameters, and error handling scenarios.
business_intent: To ensure that the SageMaker backend for litellm functions correctly and reliably across various usage patterns, thereby supporting stable AI service delivery and accurate cost tracking for customers.
